title: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, I encountered an issue. Here are the details:
OB: I observed that it is not possible to sync a .java file and another resource. However, the reasons behind this behavior are not mentioned.
EB: I expect to be able to synchronize a .java file and another resource without any issues. This feature should be fully functional.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the synchronization feature
2. Select a .java file and another resource to sync
3. Verify that attempting to synchronize both the .java file and the other resource fails
